infiltrate.translation[0].definitions[0]: to secretly join an organization or enter a place in order to find out information about it or harm it
Police attempts to infiltrate neo-Nazi groups were largely unsuccessful.
Rebel forces have been infiltrating into the country.
infiltrate.translation[0].definitions[1]: to secretly put people into an organization or place in order to find out information or to harm it
They repeatedly tried to infiltrate assassins into the palace.
infiltrate.translation[0].definitions[2]: to become a part of something â€“ used especially to show disapproval
Commercialism has been infiltrating universities for the past decade.
